answerText: El Nino[10] A weakening of this air flow pattern has been linked to stronger El Nino events. It is caused by the pressure gradient from the high pressure in the Eastern Pacific to low pressure in Indonesia.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 8 | 10 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Strong activity in the Madden Julian Oscillation occurs 6-12 months before this phenomenon but is conspicuously absent during its maximum.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this warm phase of the southern oscillation which brings warm weather and extreme flooding to south America. Its name is taken from the fact it normally happens around Christmas.
